Mercedes-Benz knows the way to their customers' heart is through their dogs.
The car company recently equipped the Internet-famous Loki the Wolfdog and his owner Kelly Lund...
...during a romp in the snowy mountains of Colorado.
...you can get a dog's eye view of plowing through the wintry terrain...
...from the back of a car and even watch from the car as Loki races the vehicle on foot.
The experience is best viewed using a device like Google Cardboard.
But you could also enjoy much of the experience in a chrome browser.
Obviously, the video is to market the latest vehicle from the company.
